description: Peptest is an automated testing framework designed to test whether or not the browsers                  UI thread remains responsive while performing a variety of actions. Tests are simple                  Javascript files which can optionally import Momills driver to manipulate the user                  interface in an automated fashion.
longdescription: Peptest is an automated testing framework designed to test whether or not the browsers                  UI thread remains responsive while performing a variety of actions. Tests are simple                  Javascript files which can optionally import Momills driver to manipulate the user                  interface in an automated fashion.
